column2: First Trust/Aberdeen Emerging Opportunity Fund (the Fund) is a diversified, closed-end management investment company. The Fund focuses on investing at least 80% of its managed assets in a diversified portfolio of equity and fixed-income securities of issuers in emerging market countries. It invests in various industries, such as banks, insurance, beverages, exploration and production, construction materials, utilities, information technology (IT) services, automobiles, tobacco, multiline retail, pipelines, food and beverage, food products, power generation, consumer finance, commercial finance, real estate, energy equipment and services and oil and gas services and equipment. It focuses its investment across various countries, such as China, Brazil, Russia, Mexico, India, Turkey, Indonesia, South Africa and Poland. The Fundâ€™s investment advisor is First Trust Advisors L.P.
